nodes.text: Falaem Onn was a member of the "Rebel Four," an elite task force of Rebel Alliance members. High-flying Falaem preferred taking the fight to the Galactic Empire with his jetpack, opening fire with twin blaster pistols.

While assaulting a squadron of stormtroopers in an Imperial base on the planet Vatleria, Falaem and his team fell into deadly traps set by Darth Vader. Falaem was blasted with flames and burned to death.

Falaem Onn, like the rest of the Rebel Four, is a parody of a member of the comic-book heroes the Fantastic Four. Falaem's flight and death by incineration are references to Johnny Storm, the Human Torch, and his name is a play on the Torch's catchphrase: "Flame on!"
Falaem Onn appears to be wearing a variant of a Rebel combat pilot's orange suit.
